solution_line_template: Lyka has to save a total of ${smartphone_cost} - ${money_on_hand} = $<<{smartphone_cost}-{money_on_hand}={amount_to_save}>>{amount_to_save} for two months.
There are {months_to_save} x {weeks_per_month} = <<{months_to_save}*{weeks_per_month}={total_weeks}>>{total_weeks} weeks in two months.
Hence, Lyka needs to save ${amount_to_save}/{total_weeks} = $<<{amount_to_save}/{total_weeks}={weekly_saving}>>{weekly_saving} per week.
